name: Programming Factory
description:
What kind of sparks will programming and factories create? Watching strings and numbers run on the conveyor belt, enjoy leisure time!!!
Programming Factory is a factory puzzle game that now supports creative workshops and customizes your own puzzles!!!

The game was independently developed by KUOKUO, hoping to bring you happiness!!!

In the continuous development of the game:
  • Bilingual support (Completed)
  • Basic construction (Completed)
  • Level 0-5 (Completed)
  • Level 6-10 (Completed)
  • Creative Workshop (Completed)
  • Level 11-15 (Completed)
  • Cloud archiving (Completed)
  • Level 16+(planned)
  • More buildings (planned)
